name: Rat-Hole
description:
A film noir detective searches an office filled with bad guys for an important "Confidential" document. It doesn't make a lot of sense, to be honest.

This game was made in <48 hours for these jams:

Utah Indie Game Jam (2015).

Indie Speed Run (October 2015).

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////// Controls //////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// WASD- Movement. W/s to move forward, A/D to turn. Space- Firing. CTRL - Jumping. ESC- Quit to menu.
